page.title: 19HOBBIES
page.content: My hobby is fishing because it is relaxing and you can go day or night.I go to the weir in Stratford-on-Avon. The fish thier are Chub,Pike,Carp and Rudd.The main tackle you need is a reel,fishing rod and line,a float and a hook.Shaun Dallisson nine years old. Windsurfing can be a sport or it can be just for fun.I am learning to windsurf.You can get lots of different boards.You can get jump boards so that if you are by a big wave you can jump it.My dad has a sail board.I cannot use it because the sail is to heavy for me.Tomas Watts aged 9 years.I go riding at Ettington.I have a pony of my own.She is a grey pony called Pepsi.She is a very good gymkhana pony.I have won two rossettes on her.We pay Â£6:00 a week for her to be kept and fed at Ettington Manor.
